item.title: Sentiment Analysis on A Million News Headlines
item.description: I’ve just finished R for Data Science by Hadley Wickham, and i figured it’s about time i do some data analysis to apply the skills I learned. I decided to do sentiment analysis after reading this post by Julia Silge. After skimming through some interesting datasets on the internet, i decided to use ’A Million Headlines` dataset which can be found on Kaggle. It’s a dataset of news headlines published over a period of 14 years from 2003 to 2017 taken from Australian news source ABC(Australian Broadcasting Group).
